name: WP LOYALTY by AD5
author: AD5

sections.description:
Easiest way to bulid up a membership site.

You can place Sign up and Sign in buttons anywhere on your site with shortcode.

Sign up and Sign in forms are displayed as a modal window, no special page required.

This plugin enable you to display different contents for guests and members on any posts and pages you would like to.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin file
  2. Unzip the file and upload into /wp-content/plugins/
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download the plugin file
  2. Unzip the file and upload into /wp-content/plugins/

Can I require checkout for member registration?

Try “LOYALTY Checkout” Add-on.
sections.changelog:
1.0 initial release
1.0.2 hide admin bar and deny access to dashboard for subscribers

short_description: Easiest way to bulid up a membership site. Display Sign up and Sign in form with shortcode and display different contents for guests and members.
